# Sarah Willington

::: text-center
### PhD student {.text-center}
:::

::: {.p style="font-size: 1.33em;"}
For my PhD, I am interested in looking at how fish size distributions are changing with ocean warming. My research uses modelling and growth analyses to look at how changes in growth and mortality affect population size distributions, and comparing these changes to real fish population distributions to gain a better understanding of what is occurring in coastal rocky reef fishes.
:::
